duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the full life-cycle recruitment process for Operations positions at multiple sites.
Collaborate with hiring managers to develop a compelling recruitment & sourcing strategy.
Liaise between internal and external candidates and hiring managers.
Engage with a diverse range of hiring managers.
Lead interview debriefs and gather standardized interview feedback.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
